steps.name: Generate coverage report
steps.run:
pip install pytest
pip install pytest-cov
pytest --cov=./ --cov-report=xml

steps.name: Install only some deps (missing gpg and bash)
Upload coverage to Codecov (should fail due to missing dependencies)
Verify dependency check failed
steps.run:
if [ "${{ steps.codecov-upload.outcome }}" = "failure" ]; then
  echo "✓ Action correctly failed due to missing dependencies"
  exit 0
else
  echo "✗ Action should have failed but didn't"
  exit 1
fi

steps.name: Install all required deps
steps.run: apk add git curl gnupg bash

steps.name: Install only some deps (missing gpg and bash)

steps.run:

  echo "✓ Action correctly failed due to missing dependencies (gpg and bash)"
  exit 0
else
  echo "✗ Action should have failed but didn't"
  exit 1
fi
